dict.string: Tap to learn about the new features !

Dear users, Connect just keeps getting better for you:
New features : - Use of CC and BBC in group emails. - New fields are available when editing a contact. - Edit default numbers and emails of a contact. - Sort alphabetically or manually in the lists. - Enabled the display of the contact count by list.
Improvements: - We added labels on swipes. - Phone extensions work when saving a phone number. - Settings have been updated and reorganized. - Performances and speed have been improved. - User Experience has been glabally improved.
Bug fixes : - Various bugs and issues have been fixed.
Thanks a lot, the Connect Team
